resources.string:
Main Help

Tap an icon below for specific help on that topic. Use the device\'s back button to return to main screen.

Reminder Editing

Editing
To edit a reminder, first expand the reminder you would like to edit by tapping on the name to show the item\'s details. Then tap on the pencil icon on the left hand side of the details. This will take you to the reminder editor. The name and details will be filled in for the reminder selected.

Saving
Make any changes you would like to the details and then use the device\'s back button to return to the main screen. All updates will be saved upon leaving the editor.

Reminder Creation

Creating
To create a new reminder, tap the plus icon on the action bar of the main screen that is located between the app title, Open Reminder, and the help symbol. Tapping on the icon will take you to the reminder editor. There, you will be able to type in a name for the reminder, select the mode of operation (time of day or timer), select the time or timer interval, and select the days you would like to repeat the reminder on.

Timer Mode
If timer is selected as the mode of operation, a time range selector is revealed at the bottom of the editor to allow the timer to operate between certain hours of the day, such as 9:00am to 5:00pm for example.

Time of Day Mode
If time of day is selected as the mode of operation, selecting the time using the number selector will show the hours in military format, from 0 to 24. Therefor, if you would like to set the time for 5:00pm you would need to select 17 as the hour.

Naming
The name of the reminder needs to be filled in for the reminder to save. Blank reminders will be discarded upon leaving the editor.

General Help

Open Reminder is a simple app that allows you to create repeating notifications for specific times and days or time intervals. The main screen contains a list of the reminders you have created.

Navigating
Navigation in Open Reminder is accomplished by selecting a button, such as create or help, to go to a new screen. The device\'s back button is then used to return to the main screen.

Open/Close Reminders
Tapping on the name of a reminder will expand the item and show details about the times and dates selected. This also reveals controls that allow you to start/stop the reminder, edit it, and delete it. Tapping on the name of the reminder again will collapse the detail view.

Countdown Timer
If a reminder is running, the time displayed to the right of the name will show the time remaining until a notification for the reminder is sounded, plus the time will be counting down. If the reminder is stopped, the time will either show the actual time a reminder is set for or the timer interval.

Reminder Starting/Stopping

Starting/Stopping
To start or stop a reminder, first tap on the name of the reminder to expand the item\'s details. The start or stop button will be on the right hand side of the details, just under the reminder\'s countdown timer. If the reminder is already started, the icon displayed will be a stop button. If the reminder is already stopped, the icon displayed will be a start (or play) button. Tapping on the icon will alternate between the reminder starting and stopping.

Mode of Operation
If the mode of operation is set to timer, stopping and then restarting a reminder will reset the timer interval. If the mode is set to time of day, restarting the reminder will continue the countdown to the specified time.

Reminder Removal

Deleting
To remove a reminder from the list, first tap the name of the reminder to expand it\'s details if it is not already open. The delete icon will be on the right hand side of the reminder\'s details just under the start/stop button. Tapping on the delete icon will bring up a confirmation dialog asking if you are certain you would like to remove the selected reminder. Choosing yes will remove the reminder from the list.
